item.title: Hello, cyber world!
item.description: Wow, I can’t believe this actually worked! I can now talk with people from the present time! You see, I’m from the future. We’re a few hundred years ahead in time. Fun fact: for some stupid reason, your timeline is the reference point 0 in time, which is why we call it the present time. Damn, I’m so excited! I’d be telling all my friends right now, but I don’t have any.
